source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_1<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Good evening)) ((Good morrow)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Good day)) ((Good evening)) /var>)) /var> to you, adventurer. Do you seek lodgings at the Hourglass?
target:
TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_1ここは宿屋「砂時計亭」です。
……ですが、まだ駈け出しの冒険者はお泊めできません。

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_2<tab>Pardon me, what was your name again? <var 29 EB02 /var>? Hmmm...I've heard nothing from Mistress Momodi about this. Alas, without her express permission, I cannot permit you to stay.
target:
TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_2あなたがウルダハでご活躍され、周囲から信頼を得られましたら、
モモディ様より利用の許可がおりるでしょう。
まずは、お仕事に励まれることです。

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_00061_Q1_000_1<tab>What would you like to do?
target: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_00061_Q1_000_1<tab>何を聞く？

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_A1_000_1<tab>Ask about the Hourglass.
target: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_A1_000_1<tab>宿屋「砂時計亭」とは？

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_A1_000_2<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_A1_000_2<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_3<tab>The Hourglass is only the most famous inn on the Merchant Strip.
target:
TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_3宿屋「砂時計亭」とは、
ウルダハで、もっとも有名な宿泊施設です。

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_4<tab>We have accommodations to satisfy every client's tastes, from lavish suites to simple rooms.
target:
TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_4豪商の泊まる最高級のお部屋から、
旅行者の泊まるお手頃値段のお部屋まで、
各種、お客様にあわせて取り揃えております。

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_5<tab>Were circumstances different, I would gladly invite you to make use of our facilities. However, we have had to enact certain policies in the wake of the Calamity and the unpleasantness that followed. Only those who have proven themselves trustworthy are permitted to stay.
target:
TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_5もちろん、冒険者むきのお部屋もございます。
しかし、霊災以降、少々治安が悪化しており……
信頼できるお客さまにしか、お部屋をお貸ししておりません。

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_6<tab>Should Mistress Momodi deem you one such individual, you may enjoy our hospitality at will.
target:
TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_6あなたが、お部屋をお貸しできる冒険者であると、
モモディ様に認められるのをお待ちしております。

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_10<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Good evening)) ((Good morrow)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Good day)) ((Good evening)) /var>)) /var> to you, adventurer. How may I serve you?
target:
TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_10こちらは宿屋「砂時計亭」です。
ご用件を承ります。

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_Q2_000_1<tab>What would you like to do?
target: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_Q2_000_1<tab>何をする？

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_A2_000_1<tab>Retire to an inn room.
target: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_A2_000_1<tab>客室に移動する

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_A2_000_2<tab>Ask about <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>resting<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_A2_000_2<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_A2_000_3<tab>Ask about inn rules.
target: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_A2_000_3<tab>客室での禁止事項について聞く

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_A2_000_4<tab>Ask about the Hourglass.
target: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_A2_000_4<tab>宿屋「砂時計亭」とは？

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_A2_000_5<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_A2_000_5<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_11<tab>As you wish, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Right this way.
target:
TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_11ご宿泊ですね、
どうぞ、ごゆっくり。

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_12<tab>The key to leading a productive life is to maintain one's health, and to do that you must needs make time to rest and recover.
target: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_12<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_SYSTEM_000_13<tab>There are few things more rejuvenating than a good night's sleep after a hard day's work.
target: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_SYSTEM_000_13<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_SYSTEM_100_13<tab>Entering an inn room grants a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>resting<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> status. This indicates that you are gradually accumulating a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rested bonus<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Should you log out from inside an inn room, the process will continue while you are offline.
target: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_SYSTEM_100_13<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_SYSTEM_000_14<tab>While a rested bonus is in effect, experience points earned through combat, synthesis, and gathering are increased by 50%.
target: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_SYSTEM_000_14<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_SYSTEM_000_15<tab>When you gain experience, your rested bonus will decrease proportionally.
target: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_SYSTEM_000_15<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_SYSTEM_000_16<tab>Once your accumulated rested bonus disappears completely, the amount of experience you gain will revert to normal.
target: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_SYSTEM_000_16<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_17<tab>I'm afraid our facilities are intended only for rest and relaxation, so a number of activities are expressly forbidden.
target:
TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_17申し訳ありませんが、砂時計亭では、
客室での「製作」を禁止させていただいております。

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_18<tab>Even if you are an acclaimed artisan, we must insist that you refrain from practicing your trade. The sound may disturb our guests who desire to rest.
target:
TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_18製作中の物音が、お休み中の他のお客さまのご迷惑となります。
よりよい休息のため、お客様のご協力をお願いいたします。

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_SYSTEM_000_18<tab>Synthesis, repairs, and materia melding cannot be performed inside inn rooms.
target:
TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_SYSTEM_000_18宿屋の客室では、
「製作」「修理」などを行うことができません。

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_19<tab>The Hourglass is only the most famous inn on the Merchant Strip.
target:
TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_19宿屋「砂時計亭」とは、
ウルダハでもっとも有名な宿泊施設です。

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_20<tab>We have accommodations to satisfy every client's tastes, from lavish suites to simple rooms.
target:
TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_20豪商の泊まる最高級のお部屋から、
旅行者の泊まるお手頃価格のお部屋まで、
各種、お客様にあわせて取り揃えております。

source: TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_21<tab>Per Mistress Momodi's request, you are free to enjoy our hospitality at will. If you wish to rest, it would be my pleasure to show you to a room.
target:
TEXT_WARPINNULDAH_OTOPAPOTTOPA_000_21もちろん、冒険者にぴったりのお部屋もご用意しております。
どうぞ、ごゆっくりお休みください。
